value.title: tiat (the intersection of art & technology)
value.description:
About Event

​Join us for a hands-on workshop exploring Strudel, a browser-based live coding language for making music with code. Whether this is your first time hearing about Strudel or you joined a previous session and want to go deeper, you’re welcome here.

​Strudel lets you create beats, melodies, and evolving musical patterns by typing simple, expressive code - no software installs required. Think of it as writing instructions for music in real time: you change the code, and the sound chan
